headerDisplay: Homebridge/HOOBS plugin to control Wemo devices.
footerDisplay: For help and support please visit our [GitHub Wiki](https://github.com/bwp91/homebridge-platform-wemo/wiki).

name.title: Name
name.description: The plugin name that will show up in Homebridge logs.

noMotionTimer.title: No Motion Timer
noMotionTimer.description: A timer (in seconds) for how long after motion is not detected that the state is changed.

ignoredDevices.title: Ignored Devices
ignoredDevices.description: You can use this optional setting to ignore (and remove) devices from Homebridge.

items.title: Serial Number
items.description: The device serial number you wish Homebridge to ignore.

manualDevices.title: Manual Devices
manualDevices.description: You can use this optional setting to define devices that should be configured manually.

disableDiscovery.title: Disable Device Discovery
disableDiscovery.description: If checked, device auto-discovery will be skipped.

discoveryInterval.title: Discovery Interval
discoveryInterval.description: An interval (in seconds) in which SSDP-SEARCH broadcasts are sent. This setting will influence the time it takes to discover new devices.

debug.title: Debug Logging
debug.description: If checked, more information will be added to the Homebridge log.

disableDeviceLogging.title: Disable Device Logging
disableDeviceLogging.description: If checked, device updates will not be added to the Homebridge log.

makerTypes.title: Sensors
makerTypes.description: You can choose how your Wemo Maker is shown in Homebridge.

serialNumber.title: Maker Serial Number
serialNumber.description: Serial number of the Wemo Maker, normally in the format 2*************.

makerType.title: Maker Type
makerType.description: How this Maker should be appear in Homebridge/HomeKit.

layout.title: Required Settings
layout.description: These are the basic settings that are required for this plugin to work.

layout.title: Optional Settings
layout.description: A variety of optional settings for general use of this plugin.

items.helpvalue: Please see the wiki to manually configure this.
